description:
Cette présentation démontrera à travers le code comment créer un HTML Custom Element accessible, globlisable, performant et fonctionnant même sur IE9 en moins de 30 minutes avec la librairie open source delite.


Author:
Christophe Jolif
Christophe is a Senior Software Engineer at IBM. He is a Dojo Toolkit committer with a special focus on advanced visualization components and his leading IBM WebSphere team contributions to the toolkit including work on Dojo Mobile components. Before joining IBM, Christophe worked for ILOG for more than a decade developing visualization components for the Web and representing ILOG on Web standardization groups, including the W3C SVG Working Group.
title: Comment créer un Web Component en moins de 30 minutes
